name: ynasser
body:
What I like:
* cryptography, especially end-to-end auditable voting systems
* clean, efficient code
* gardening, especially pumpkins
* riding and fixing bicycles

What I want:
* a job doing interesting backend work or crypto research
* free cake everyday
* vim to stop crashing when I am working on large files for 15+ hours

What I don't like:
* unnecessary pedanticism
* climate change
* elitism, condescension 

What I don't want:
* to live somewhere that doesn't have good public transit or bicycle lanes
* the effects of climate change to become irreversible




Where I exist on the internet:

github: [github.com/ynasser](goo.gl/mVdPbf)
keybase: [keybase.io/ynasser](goo.gl/r1kBe5)
email: ynasser {swirly a symbol} uwaterloo {dot} ca
twitter: [twitter.com/yomnapple](goo.gl/M6sKSo)
linkedin: [https://ca.linkedin.com/pub/yomna-nasser/55/74a/8aa](goo.gl/VrEH5C)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
